page.title: 01WEST HUNTINGTOWER (1)
page.content: West Huntingtower The village is two and a half miles west of Perth. There are twenty one houses, some new and some old cottages modernised. No shops remain but there is a hall which belonged to Tibbermore church - both now closed. West Huntingtower has several buses passing through the village - Midland Scottish runs services to Pitcairngreen and St. Fillans by Crieff and Comrie, and occasionally Tibermore. J.Duff and Sons runs a local bus to Crieff and Madderty, and Stagecoach runs via Tibbermore to Auchterarder at school times. A traffic count at mid morning gave sixty eight vehicles going west and fifty seven going east, a total of one hundred and twenty five in ten minutes.
